CustomField.description: Field created for conditionally showing injury related fields
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Breast Cancer (DNQ)"), "Breast Cancer (DNQ)", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Uterine Cancer"), "Uterine Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Vaginal Cancer"), "Vaginal Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Lung Cancer (DNQ)"), "Lung Cancer (DNQ)", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Endometrial Cancer"), "Endometrial Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Fallopian Tube Cancer"), "Fallopian Tube Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Mesothelioma"), "Mesothelioma", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Uterine Fibroid (DNQ)"), "Uterine Fibroid (DNQ)", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Vulvar Cancer"), "Vulvar Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Cervical Cancer"), "Cervical Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Hysterectomy (DNQ)"), "Hysterectomy (DNQ)", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Primary Peritoneal Cancer"), "Primary Peritoneal Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Carcinosarcoma"), "Carcinosarcoma", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Endometriosis (DNQ)"), "Endometriosis (DNQ)", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Ovarian Cancer"), "Ovarian Cancer", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Injury_diagnosed_with__c , "Omentum Cancer"), "Omentum Cancer", NULL)
CustomField.label: Injury diagnosed with text
